effect.gold_silver: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.crystal: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.

short_effect.gold_silver: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.crystal: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

flavor_text.gold_silver: An attack based on lack of loyalty.
flavor_text.crystal: An attack based on lack of loyalty.
